channel.title: SMF 79 Subtype 15 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 79 Subtype 15 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF79S15 Based on: flg Description SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79DTE

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79DTE Description DATE RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF79S15 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79FLG Description SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - fpl
item.description: Length of IMS Long Lock Data Section Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79FPL Description Length of IMS Long Lock Data Section

item.title: Field - fpn
item.description: Number of IMS Long Lock Data Sections Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79FPN Description Number of IMS Long Lock Data Sections

item.title: Field - fpo
item.description: Offset to IMS Long Lock Data Section Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79FPO Description Offset to IMS Long Lock Data Section

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79LEN Description SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF79S15 Based on: flg Description OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79PRL Description LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79PRN Description NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79PRS Description OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - r79fctid
item.description: CICS Task ID (If CICS) Map: R79FIRLM Based on: R79FCTID Description CICS Task ID (If CICS)

item.title: Field - r79fdlkc
item.description: Dead Lock Cycle Number Map: R79FIRLM Based on: R79FDLKC Description Dead Lock Cycle Number

item.title: Field - r79fetyp
item.description: ‘B’=Blocker / ‘W’=Waiter Map: R79FIRLM Based on: R79FETYP Description ‘B’=Blocker / ‘W’=Waiter

item.title: Field - r79fimsi
item.description: IMS Subsystem ID Map: R79FIRLM Based on: R79FIMSI Description IMS Subsystem ID

item.title: Field - r79fistn
item.description: IRLM Lock Structure Name Map: R79FIRLM Based on: R79FISTN Description IRLM Lock Structure Name

item.title: Field - r79flhcn
item.description: Max Lock Held-PSTLKHLD Map: R79FIRLM Based on: R79FLHCN Description Max Lock Held-PSTLKHLD

item.title: Field - r79flhti
item.description: Scheduled elapsed time Map: R79FIRLM Based on: R79FLHTI Description Scheduled elapsed time

item.title: Field - r79flkna
item.description: Lock Name Map: R79FIRLM Based on: R79FLKNA Description Lock Name

item.title: Field - r79fpsbn
item.description: PSB Name Map: R79FIRLM Based on: R79FPSBN Description PSB Name

item.title: Field - r79fpstn
item.description: PST Number Map: R79FIRLM Based on: R79FPSTN Description PST Number

item.title: Field - r79frcvt
item.description: Recovery Token Map: R79FIRLM Based on: R79FRCVT Description Recovery Token

item.title: Field - r79frgty
item.description: Region Type Map: R79FIRLM Based on: R79FRGTY Description Region Type

item.title: Field - r79frsna
item.description: Resource (DB/Area) Name Map: R79FIRLM Based on: R79FRSNA Description Resource (DB/Area) Name

item.title: Field - r79ftrnm
item.description: Trans name / Job name Map: R79FIRLM Based on: R79FTRNM Description Trans name / Job name

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF79S15 Based on: flg Description NEW RECORD FORMAT Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79RTY Description RECORD TYPE

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79SEG Description SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79SID Description SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79SSI Description SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF )

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79STY Description SUBTYPE

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF79S15 Based on: flg Description SUBTYPES USED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF79S15 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TIME RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79TME Description TIME RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF79S15 Based on: SMF79TRN Description NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF79S15 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF79S15 Based on: flg Description MVS/XA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.
